name: Sheep Dog (itch)
description:
[Play in Fullscreen]

THE SHEEP ARE LOOSE!

It’s your sworn duty to collect the lost sheep. This task is crucial - if you don’t find them all, the sheep will become dinner for the wolves. For every sheep you miss, a new wolf will appear the next night…

Features

  • Hide and seek - the sheep are hiding, and your barks will hint at their location
  • Water - the dog can cross the water but the sheep cannot. Do you want to collect them all, or will you rush to the barn?
  • A saved sheep or fodder? - every sheep that is left behind in one level will become a wolf in the next one
  • NO ESCAPE BUTTON YOU WILL NOT ESCAPE

Controls

  • L-click to move
  • R-click to bark (will reveal sheep)
  • Space to bite

—----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
